question.text: James has a two-hour drive to make on a motorway. He has a cold and his nose is also slightly blocked. He takes an off-the-shelf cold remedy to help reduce the symptoms. It is a cold and dull day and the car heater is on. James also turns on his dipped headlights. An hour into the boring journey, James begins to feel drowsy.
question.part: How is the boring journey physically affecting James?
